name: Crystal Vibes feat. Ott.
description: Official selection of Sundance Film Festival New Frontier and Kaleidoscope Showcase Vol. 2 now available on Steam! Experience candy-colored psychedelic sound rippling through an infinite crystal universe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 980 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better. Storage: 5 GB available space
